comments:
Test environment:

- RHEL EL 4 WS with Update 4
- Eclipse M20060912-1730
- JEM M20060825
- GEF 3.2
- emf-sdo-xsd-SDK-M200608241248
- WTP M 1.5.1-200609071217
- Sun JDK 1.5.0_08 and IBM JDK.  

When running a plug-in that uses the SWT_AWT bridge, after some time (20 mins or so), an error dialog shows up with the StackOverflowError.  This is in the error log:

Caused by: java.lang.StackOverflowError: OS stack overflow
>            at sun.awt.X11.XlibWrapper.CallErrorHandler(Native Method)
>            at sun.awt.X11.XToolkit.SAVED_ERROR_HANDLER(XToolkit.java:161)
>            at sun.awt.X11.XToolkit.GlobalErrorHandler(XToolkit.java:172)

The line prefixed by > is repeated over and over again.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 74095 ***
